title: 414: Money Scripts with Enoch Sears and Rion Willard
itunes:title: 414: Money Scripts with Enoch Sears and Rion Willard
description:
Money scripts. What are they and how do they affect our results? In this episode of the Business of Architecture podcast vault, we talk about the intersection between the psychology of finance and art. How does one's mindset about money affect one's results?

Visit http://smartpracticemethod.com for a free architecture firm owner Masterclass on how to structure your architecture practice for freedom, fulfillment and financial reward.
